thread.title: W.
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by W.

author: W.
title: W.
text: We have a modest but growing art collection ranging from mid 19th century to contemporary pieces. We found that the tutorials and clear instructions made the framing process incredibly easy. The selection of frames and pricing was impossible to beat and the satisfaction of framing and hanging our favorite pieces was truly transformative. We will look to American Frame for all of our framing needs.
